changeSet.sql: WITH role_series AS ( SELECT generate_series(1, 4) AS role_count ) INSERT INTO user_role_links(active,inserted_date_at_utc, user_id, role_id) SELECT FALSE, '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000'::TIMESTAMP + (FLOOR(RANDOM() * 30) + 1)::INTEGER * INTERVAL '7 day' + (FLOOR(RANDOM() * 24))::INTEGER * INTERVAL '1 hour' + (FLOOR(RANDOM() * 60))::INTEGER * INTERVAL '10 minute' + (FLOOR(RANDOM() * 60))::INTEGER * INTERVAL '18 second', u.id, CASE WHEN rs.role_count % 2 = 0 THEN 2 ELSE 1 END FROM users u, role_series rs

changeSet.author: anastasia.yurkova2003@gmail.com
changeSet.sql: UPDATE user_role_links url SET updated_date_at_utc = prev.inserted_date_at_utc FROM ( SELECT id, user_id, role_id, inserted_date_at_utc, LEAD(inserted_date_at_utc) OVER (PARTITION BY user_id ORDER BY inserted_date_at_utc DESC) FROM user_role_links WHERE active = FALSE ) prev WHERE url.user_id = prev.user_id

changeSet.author: anastasia.yurkova2003@gmail.com
changeSet.sql: UPDATE user_role_links AS url SET active = TRUE, updated_date_at_utc = NULL WHERE (url.user_id, url.inserted_date_at_utc) IN ( SELECT user_id, MAX(inserted_date_at_utc) AS latest_inserted_date FROM user_role_links WHERE active = FALSE GROUP BY user_id )
